Reviews.Title: difficult to rate with stars-read my review for more info
Reviews.Author: J. L. Langlois
Reviews.Content: Here's the deal.  I LOVE this PC!  Huge screen, portable, etc.  I bought this "refurbished".  I was hesitant, but after reading more about refurbished systems I decided I would do it as they say most times these items are returned for minimal, if any, problems and the problems are addressed prior to selling as refurbished.  I felt especially comfortable because I was buying through Amazon from the Acer Outlet directly.  Set up was easy and as I said I loved it; however, it turned out that my system had ADWARE!!!!  What I thought was my firefox search was being pushed to "conduit search" and I had several pop ups no matter what I did.  I googled conduit search and found out what it was and then was able to purchase a program to rid my system of this.  That's the disappointing part of my purchase and hence the 3 stars.  If it was on the PC itself I would have given 5 stars.
